item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossless)】WAV - Katy Perry - Dark Horse (Pack) [24bits / 44.1kHz] (Fanmade EP)
item.description:
Katy Perry - Dark Horse (EP) [Pack]
  • Artist: Katy Perry
  • Album: Dark Horse
  • Genre: Pop
  • Format: WAV
  • Sample Rate: 24-Bit / 44.1 kHz
Tracklist:
  1. Dark Horse (Solo Version) [Edit]
  2. Dark Horse (feat. Juicy J)
  3. Dark Horse (feat. Pitbull) [Remastered]
  4. Dark Horse (feat. Juicy J & Pitbull)
  5. Dark Horse (Official Instrumental)

The Solo Version / Edit, remastered Pitbull mix, and double feature Juicy J & Pitbull mix were created by myself using the official lossless stems, the lossless album version, and acapella/vocal pieces filtered and touched up by me. I meticulously scrubbed all traces of Juicy J for the solo edit and included my own custom use of Katy vocals to fill the rap bridge. I think it works well. Official instrumental was thrown in as a final track just for funsies.


Hidden Content:
You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.
Enjoy!
item.author: Mix-N-Mash Music
